comment: Induction on the integers from ` M ` to ` N ` inclusive. The first four hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the last two are the basis and the induction step. Version of ~ fzind using integer range definitions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Feb-2016.)
